greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Term at which n appears in A064413 (if it begins at 2).
comment: Every nonnegative number appears here exactly once.
link: J. C. Lagarias, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, The EKG sequence, Exper. Math. 11 (2002), 437-446.
Index entries for sequences related to EKG sequence
mathematica: ekg[s_] := Block[{m = s[[-1]], k = 3}, While[MemberQ[s, k] || GCD[m, k] == 1, k++]; Append[s, k]];
Array[a, terms] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 30 2018, after _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
